title: A beautiful rose mid old world cham
body: I adore this rose, a very old roseand has so much history attached.  First came across in relation to the Poem Roman de la Rose.  It’s romantic and has stood the test of time from at least 16th century,, most likely a lot older. timeless and truly historic, purportedly named for Rosalind Clifford, the Fair Rosalind’ long term mistress of Henry 11
